labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.short_description: Removing all reactions on a message causes Discord to crash
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a channel where you have "Manage Messages" permission - Press the 3 dots next to a message with 2 or more reactions - Delete all the reactions by everyone, so there are none left - Discord will crash when it's loading after you've deleted all reactions
